price: 39. Wij schiepen hen niet behalve met waarheid maar de meesten van hen weten het niet.
arabic: مَا خَلَقۡنَٰهُمَآ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: mā khalaqnāhumā illā bil-ḥaqi walākinna aktharahum lā yaʿlamūna
